Title: PI Approximation
Description: Program to calculate approximation of PI using two methods: Monte Carlo and rectangle.

Title: Equation Calculator
Description:
Program to calculate given eqation. Well… not exactyl equation :)
It counts things like: 552+5^(1*4/2)-2.2*7^3-3*(5*(2/3)) etc.

Title: Matrix Calculator
Description:
Program to calculate many operations with matrices!
E.g. transposition, multiplication, determinant and trace or description of matrix.
